DOC.brief_summary: Collecting blood, graft liver effluent and urine samples from patients undergoing orthotopic liver transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: Changes of Macrophage Migration Inhibitory Factor During Orthotopic Liver Transplantation
DOC.detailed_description: Aims are to measure Macrophage Migration Inhibitory Factor in serum, liver graft effluent and urine in and evaluate MIF's role in hepatic ischemia/reperfusion injury, postoperative graft function and kidney function.
DOC.criteria: End stage liver disease, chronic liver failure, orthotopic liver transplantation Combined transplantations (liver plus kidney or lung), age under 18 y, acute liver failure
